author: samwilsn
content:
Tiny clarification PR for EIP-3074: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/3545

The address in the signed bytes needs to be the active state address, not strictly the address of the current contract. This only occurs with `CALLCODE` and `DELEGATECALL`.

author: samwilsn
content: No action needed, just want to keep everyone up to date.
